text:
It seems as though this particular bug is related to URLs where Basic 
Authentication is required.  When I try to hit any URL that requires basic 
authentication, the java.io.Exception error is thrown from line 464 in 
HTTPSampler.java.

creator: csmith4@us.ibm.com
text:
This issue has not been entirely resolved yet. Using the May 6th 2002 build, I 
was able to circumvent the problem by commenting out the line of code that 
throws the new IOException() on line 486 of 
org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.sampler.HTTPSampler.java.

The previous call to getResponseCode() is causing a FileNotFoundException (of 
all things) to be thrown by the underlying HTTP stream implementation. I would 
guess this is due to the fact that some servlets close() their output stream.

Chris Smith
csmith4@us.ibm.com
